title: Can't connect to the Wi-Fi
description: I can see the Wi-Fi network on my laptop, but when I try to connect it says 'unable to join'.

title: Internet is really slow today
description: Pages are taking forever to load and video calls keep freezing. It was fine yesterday.

title: VPN keeps dropping
description: I connect to the VPN and it works for a few minutes, then suddenly disconnects without warning.

title: No internet access on guest Wi-Fi
description: I connected to the guest Wi-Fi but it says 'connected, no internet'. Other people seem to be fine.

title: Ethernet port not working
description: I plugged in the Ethernet cable and nothing happens. No lights, no connection. Tried a different cable too.

title: My desktop can’t find the network printer
description: I’m trying to print but the printer doesn’t show up anymore. It used to be there last week.

title: Random disconnects from the network
description: Every couple hours my PC says 'network disconnected' for no reason. I have to manually reconnect each time.

title: Wired connection slower than Wi-Fi
description: I plugged into Ethernet for better speed but it’s actually slower than my wireless connection.

title: Can’t access shared drive
description: I get a 'network path not found' error when trying to open the shared folder. It was working fine last week.

title: Network keeps switching between access points
description: My laptop switches between two Wi-Fi networks constantly. It disrupts my connection every few minutes.

title: Wi-Fi signal is very weak in my office
description: The Wi-Fi works but is super weak in my corner of the office. Calls keep dropping.

title: Getting IP conflict warning
description: I keep getting a pop-up that says 'IP address conflict with another system on the network'. Not sure what to do.

title: Unable to ping gateway
description: I can’t access the internet and when I ping the default gateway, it times out. I’ve rebooted my machine.

title: Zoom works but browser doesn’t
description: I’m on the network and Zoom calls work, but Chrome and Edge won’t load any pages.

title: Wi-Fi says 'connected, secured' but no internet
description: I'm on the main office Wi-Fi and it says I’m connected, but I can’t browse or do anything online.

title: VPN connects but can't access internal tools
description: I can connect to the VPN, but none of the internal tools or drives are working afterward.

title: Office printer not reachable over network
description: The printer in room 3B doesn’t respond. It says 'offline' when I try to print.

title: Teams drops call every few minutes
description: I’m using a wired connection but Teams still drops my calls every 5–10 minutes.

title: Can’t connect to any shared folders
description: None of the shared folders open anymore. I get an 'access denied' or 'not found' error.

title: Laptop won't reconnect after sleep
description: When I wake my laptop up from sleep, it doesn’t reconnect to Wi-Fi. I have to reboot every time.

title: Ping is too high during video calls
description: My connection works, but latency is crazy high during Zoom and Google Meet calls. Makes it impossible to communicate.

title: Wi-Fi keeps asking for password repeatedly
description: Even after entering the correct password, the network keeps asking me to enter it again and again.

title: Network drive mapping not working
description: My drive mapping disappears after reboot and doesn’t reconnect automatically like it used to.

title: Access Point rebooted on its own
description: My Wi-Fi dropped and I noticed the access point above me restarted. This has happened twice today.

title: Ethernet jack loose or damaged
description: I have to wiggle the Ethernet cable to get it to connect. Might be a loose port in the wall.

title: Wi-Fi blocked certain websites
description: I can’t access a few websites on Wi-Fi that I could on mobile data. I don’t think they should be blocked.

title: No internet after moving desks
description: Ever since I moved desks, I haven’t been able to connect to Wi-Fi or Ethernet. Worked fine at my old spot.

title: My IP keeps changing unexpectedly
description: I noticed my IP address changes every day. It’s messing with my remote access tools.

title: My MAC address is being blocked
description: I think my laptop’s MAC address is being blocked by the firewall. I can’t connect unless I use another device.

title: Packet loss during upload
description: I’ve been seeing a lot of packet loss when uploading files to SharePoint. Download seems fine.

title: Network cable gets unplugged message
description: Every now and then I get a pop-up that the network cable was unplugged, even though it’s still connected.

title: Can’t remote desktop into my work machine
description: I can’t RDP into my office PC from home anymore. It just times out after a minute.

title: VoIP phone has no dial tone
description: My desk phone shows 'network unavailable' and there's no dial tone. Other phones nearby seem fine.

title: Wi-Fi auto-connect not working
description: I always have to manually pick the network even though it’s set to auto-connect.

title: Teams status not updating
description: My Teams status doesn’t change unless I restart the app. Might be a network sync issue?

title: Can't access certain internal websites
description: A few of the internal sites are showing 'connection refused'. Others work fine.

title: Captive portal not showing on guest Wi-Fi
description: When guests connect to our Wi-Fi, the login page doesn’t appear anymore. Just stays disconnected.

title: Firewall might be blocking updates
description: My antivirus can’t update and says it’s being blocked. Could it be the firewall?

title: Slow download speeds on wired connection
description: Even though I’m wired in, I’m getting less than 10Mbps. Should be much faster.

title: Mobile devices not connecting to Wi-Fi
description: My phone and tablet both get 'authentication error' when trying to join the Wi-Fi.

title: VoIP audio cutting in and out
description: During calls, my VoIP phone audio keeps cutting out. People say I sound robotic.

title: Can’t join meetings from Citrix
description: When using Citrix, Zoom and Teams won’t connect. Seems like a network issue from within the session.

title: DNS resolution failing intermittently
description: Sometimes websites don’t load and I get 'DNS not resolved'. A refresh usually fixes it, but it keeps happening.

title: Wi-Fi keeps dropping after update
description: Ever since my system updated, I keep getting kicked off Wi-Fi. Didn’t happen before.

title: Network switch might be down
description: Multiple people in our row lost connectivity at the same time. Could the switch be down?

title: Proxy is blocking external apps
description: A couple of third-party apps say 'proxy authentication required'. I didn’t change any settings.

title: Losing access to OneDrive on VPN
description: As soon as I connect to the VPN, OneDrive says it’s offline. Disconnecting restores access.

title: Wi-Fi icon missing after reboot
description: After restarting, my Wi-Fi icon is gone and I can't see any wireless networks.

title: my vpn is not connecting
description: help

title: My vpn doesnt work
description: my vpn doesnt work on my laptop , i dont know what the issue is , is it the wifi or the laptop hardware
